Persona 4, another in renown and award-winning Shin Megami Tensei series, is a riveting murder mystery RPG featuring an entirely new cast, loads more story, content, action, and depth. Shortly after an urban youth begins a year-long stay in the countryside town of Inaba, the rural towns peace is shattered by a horrific murder that leaves no clues or suspects. As the lone incident develops into a series of bizarre crimes, he discovers that only he and his friends have the power to solve the baffling case, bring those responsible to justice, and restore harmony to his new home.

Persona 4 Golden for PlayStation Vita offers an enhanced and expanded portable version of the highly acclaimed original. Visuals have been beautifully remastered to take advantage of the PS Vita's crisp, vibrant 5" OLED display. The game's aural presentation is better than ever, with 1.5 times the voiced dialogue of the original release.  A new online dungeon rescue feature allows users to call on other players for assistance when they are about to die in the TV world.  Persona 4 Golden is also overflowing with new content: new Personas to collect; new story events along with an all-new character; new anime cutscenes, which include a new opening animation with a new song from master composer Shoji Meguro; a host of fan suggested tweaks and changes, and much more!

They have to eat a lot of fruit before they can transform into beautiful butterflies, but none of them can jump high enough to get it -- none, except for Little Chomp, that is! Trine 2 is a sidescrolling game of action, puzzles and platforming. You play as one of the Three Heroes who make their way through dangers untold in a fantastical fairytale world. The game features an exciting adventure full of action, including physics-based puzzles using fire, water, gravity and magic; wicked goblins on a quest to ruin the kingdom for good; and a magical environment full of wonder. For the first time in the series, Trine 2 introduces online cooperative multiplayer support for up to three players, alongside the local multiplayer mode.

This Director's Cut also includes Trine 2: Goblin Menace, an additional campaign spanning six unique levels and featuring levels that further improve the award-winning visuals of the original Trine 2. In addition, Goblin Menace features new revolutionary skills that are also playable in the original game.

description:
Explore Middle-earth in an epic and thrilling LEGO video game adventure for the entire family! LEGO The Lord of the Rings brings to life the legendary fantasy saga by J.R.R. Tolkien. The game follows the original storylines of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King. Players can team up in pairs as adorable LEGO The Lord the Rings minifigures to experience countless dangers, solve riddles and battle formidable foes on their journey to Mount Doom.

Traverse the Misty Mountains, explore the Mines of Moria, knock on the Black Gate of Mordor, and partake in epic battles with Orcs, Uruk-hai, the Balrog and other fearsome foes while harnessing the humour and imagination of LEGO gameplay to solve puzzles and explore Middle-earth.  Players will take on the form of their favorite members of the fellowship -- Frodo the Hobbit, Aragorn the Ranger, Gandalf the Wizard, Legolas the Elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Boromir a Man of Gondor, and Frodo's Hobbit friends Sam, Merry and Pippin -- as they relive the most momentous events from the films inspired by J.R.R. Tolkien's epic novels.

A spectacular new vision from legendary developers BioWare, Mass Effect challenges players to lead a squad of freedom fighters as they struggle against threatening armies to restore peace in the land.

Mass Effect is the first in a trilogy of games with an overarching story. As the first human Specter – sworn defenders of galactic peace – your mission is to halt the advancing armies of a legendary agent gone rogue. But as you lead your elite team across hostile alien worlds, you will discover the true threat is far greater than anyone imagined.

description:
Uncharted: Fight For Fortune is an action-adventure turn-based card game featuring the heroes and villains from the Uncharted universe. The core gameplay in Uncharted: Fight for Fortune involves creating a team of Faction cards featuring heroes, villains, and mercenaries from the Uncharted universe, then using that team to defeat your opponent while defending yourself from their attacks. Each Faction card can be equipped with powerful Resource and valuable Fortune cards, which enhance their stats and give them special abilities. Once you've selected and equipped a card, it's time to head into battle! During combat, attacks either reduce the health of opposing Faction cards or the health of your opponent. Defeating an opposing Faction card removes it from play, while reducing the health of your opponent to zero wins you the game.

This downloadable game connects up with the hit PlayStation Vita game Uncharted: Golden Abyss for players who want to further expand their card set. Using the 300 artifacts that can be found within Golden Abyss, you can go to battle with other players as well as AI opponents. The game can also be played independently of Golden Abyss, so owning the PS Vita title is not required.
title: Uncharted: Fight For Fortune

Bring wizardry to life in your living room on PlayStation 3 in this interactive wizard simulation designed for PlayStation Move and Wonderbook. Enjoy an entirely new creation from the imagination of J.K. Rowling, set in the world of the Harry Potter stories.

Discover exclusive, new and original worlds brought to you by J.K. Rowling that comes to life as you read in Wonderbook: Book of Spells. Over two hundred years ago, Miranda Goshawk drafted the Book of Spells, which can be found in the Restricted Section of the Hogwarts library. This advanced textbook will assist students on their journey to becoming an accomplished witch or wizard. Read, discover, learn and practice spells such as Incendio, Wingardium Leviosa and Expelliarmus, as well as discover mischievous notes, spells and humorous anecdotal facts scribbled into the margins by previous Hogwarts students. J.K. Rowling has written a conundrum that leads you through the experience, providing insight into the values a witch or wizard has to learn, and inviting you to journey through the book to unlock new content, rewarding successful students along the way.

The "Devil May Cry DNA" of stylish action, rewarding combat and a brash, smart-talking protagonist all remains; however, it has now injected with a dark and brutal gameplay that promises to redefine the franchise.

The Dante of DmC is a young man who has no respect for authority or society in general. Dante knows that he is not human, but also that he is not like the demons that have tormented him throughout his life. Caught between worlds, he feels like an outcast. He is now discovering and coming to terms with what it means to be the child of a demon and an angel. This split personality has a real impact on gameplay with Dante being able to call upon angel and demon abilities at will, transforming his Rebellion sword on the fly to dramatically affect both combat and movement.

In Mass Effect 3, an ancient alien race known only as Reapers, has launched an all-out invasion of the galaxy, leaving nothing but a trail of destruction in their wake. Earth has been taken, the galaxy is on the verge of total annihilation, and you are the only one who can stop them. The price of failure is extinction. Only you can determine how events will play out, which planets you will save from annihilation and which alliances you will form or abandon as you rally the forces of the galaxy to eliminate the Reaper threat once and for all.

With co-op online multiplayer missions new to the Mass Effect universe , you can choose from a variety of classes and races, form an elite Special Forces squad, and combine weapons, powers and abilities to devastating effect as you all fight together to liberate key territories from enemy control in this third entry of the epic intergalactic RPG franchise.

The evil witch Mizrabel finds herself an unwilling inhabitant of Wasteland, and unleashes a plot to escape using the Castle of Illusion to imprison and drain the cartoon essence from currently famous Toons.  Players will take on the role of Mickey Mouse as he utilizes his magical brush to wield paint and thinner to confront Mizrabel and save the Toons.

In this game, Reality is What You Paint of It.  Disney Epic Mickey for 3DS offers a special drawing and painting function that allows players to create rough versions of objects that magically transform into classic Disney-style 2D illustrations.  Utilizing the game's unparalleled dual screen integration, players then move their creations to the top screen where they are further transformed into full-color, fully-rendered 3D visuals.

description:
Bladeslinger is a fast-paced 3rd-person action brawler for high-end mobile and tablet devices where players must defeat multiple enemies at once in both ranged and close combat.

Set in a dystopic alternate future in the fictional town of Hammer's Peak, the narrative follows William Glaston as he returns home after many years of war to find his home town has undergone nightmarish changes.
title: Bladeslinger: Episode 1

description:
With tons of wacky contraptions and goofy animals, Funky Barn is not your average game on the farm.  Ready to make some wool? Pop your sheep into The Shearing Machine and he will hilariously cannonball out ... surprised but shorn. Ready to harvest your crops? Hook up the Flying FruitBox-Haybale-Copter that flies around crazily picking up boxes of fruit and grain. It won't take long for gamers to become immersed in their growing farm as they also manage livestock, crop fields, and a wide variety of unique farm machines.  In such an open farming world, gamers can focus on the aspects of farming they find to be the most fun.

Funky Barn for Wii U brings wacky contraptions and goofy gizmos to the sandbox genre in ways never before imagined thanks to the innovative Wii U GamePad. Using the touch screen, players can pick up their animals and interact with them one-on-one, manage an array of crazy farming machines, and erect buildings. They can even shake fruit from the trees with all-new GamePad gyroscope.
title: Funky Barn

description: ESPN Sports Connection lets family and friends connect and play the most popular sports from a new perspective. Developed specifically for Nintendo's Wii U system to take full advantage of its unique tablet controller, the game lets gamers play solo, team up in co-op to experience new gameplay possibilities, or compete in multiplayer challenges in events that cross six popular sports: soccer, football, baseball, tennis, golf, and karting.
title: ESPN Sports Connection

description: Sonic the Hedgehog and all the rest of SEGA's great cast of characters hit the road again in this sequel to the hit racing game. Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed offers convertible vehicles, brand new characters, and killer All-Stars moves! Following on from the huge success of Sonic & SEGA All-Star's Racing, the characters now have their own unique transforming vehicles designed to take advantage of the varying terrain. The line-up on the Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed grid sees SEGA favorites -- including Sonic the Hedgehog, Dr Eggman and AiAi -- return to battle against newcomers that include Gilius Thunderhead of Golden Axe and Vyse of Skies of Arcadia.
platforms: Wii U Xbox 360 3DS PC iPhone Android Vita PS3
rating_content: Animated Blood, Mild Cartoon Violence, Mild Language
title: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed

description: Infestation: Survivor Stories is a zombie survival MMO by Hammerpoint Interactive.
title: Infestation: Survivor Stories

description: Explore ancient tombs of lost civilizations in Labyrinth Legends. Evade concealed traps. Solve intuitive puzzles. Collect stars and gold, and discover hidden treasure, weapons, artifacts and more. But stay alert to battle foreboding mummies, zombies, ghouls and other monsters hidden in the shadows.
title: Labyrinth Legends

description: An independently-created game crafted using a voxel engine (similar to Minecraft,) Ace of Spaces is a multiplayer shooter offering sandbox elements in addition to online combat. Choose between a Blue and Green Team and battle it out in rivers and on mountains in a cuboid world where you can create shelters, tunnels, and bases with the ultimate goal of eliminating the enemies and capturing their intel.
title: Ace of Spades

description: Run, jump, and power your way through this monstrously fun action game! Journey through the city of Monstropolis with famous scare teams from Monsters, Inc., and find a way to rescue Boo.
title: Monsters Inc. Run

description: In Pudding Monsters, players will take the Pudding Monsters on an adventure – off the table, out of the house and into the city – swiping to stick the Monsters together as they become the Ultimate Mega Monster to save their friend from being kidnapped by the cold-hearted fridge owner. Different monster species have different powers (like Slime Monster, who leaves a trail of green goo), creating unique twists and turns in gameplay as the adventure unfolds.
title: Pudding Monsters

description: Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage is an expansion pack offererd as DLC for Borderlands 2.
rating_content: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol
title: Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage

description: PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale is free-for-all brawler showcasing the best and brightest of PlayStation's characters and worlds. From Kratos to Sly Cooper, Sweet Tooth to Parappa the Rapper, Sony characters from all over the gaming spectrum are brought together in a fighting adventure that's both easy to play, and hard to master. Take the battle online for competitive multiplayer action, or go head to head with a group of friends on the couch and prove once and for all who's really the best!
rating_content: Crude Humor, Mild Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Violence
title: PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale

description: For its 2K13 edition, the NBA 2K franchise is back and bigger than ever. This year, 2K Sports has joined forces with the legendary JAY Z as Executive Producer to transcend sports video games and take virtual hardwood to the next level. Featuring an enhanced MyCareer mode and all-new gameplay features, NBA 2K13 will let gamers pit the best players in NBA history against the new dynasty of talent, including the much-debated match-up between the 2012 U.S. Men's National Team and the 1992 "Dream Team."
platforms: Wii U Xbox 360 PC PSP Wii PS3
title: NBA 2K13

description: The living will have to survive amongst the dead in this game based on The Walking Dead, the widely acclaimed comic book series and television series. Across five dark and emotional episodes of gameplay, every decision and action you take can result in the entire story of the game changing around you.
rating_content: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
title: The Walking Dead: The Game -- Episode 5: No Time Left

description: NFL QUARTERBACK CLUB '97 uses gameplay elements like the kicking T-meter, the three-quarter overhead camera angle, and the button assignments and controls you've grown accustomed to with other football titles. The player animations are smooth and very real looking, and the large player sprites are easily identified by the names and numbers on their jerseys. A unique feature is the Custom Simulation mode, where you can create and save up to five game situations, for those times when you can't finish a game at that moment. As an added bonus, cover boy Brett Favre has designed his own special plays that you can use in the game. You can also take on a friend in the Multiplayer mode to prove your gridiron superiority.
title: NFL Quarterback Club '97

description: Go retro with NAMCO MUSEUM VOL. 2, a collection of some of the best games from the glory days of the arcade. This volume features XEVIOUS, MAPPY, GAPLUS, GROBDA, DRAGONBUSTER, and SUPER PAC-MAN. While these games weren't ground breaking with the exception of XEVIOUS they all offer engrossing gameplay that will take you back to the days of acid washed jeans and leg warmers.  Each game is an exact replica of its arcade counterpart, and they even include the arcade dipswitches, which allow you to tune the difficulty to your liking. So go back in time to the early days of videogames with NAMCO MUSEUM VOL. 2.
title: Namco Museum Vol. 2

description: Two settlers are heading to Silver Town to search for their missing son. Along the way, they will encounter strange creatures and characters like vampires, werewolves, the town sheriff, a preacher, and a few angry desperadoes that will do anything to stop them. Detailed, hand-drawn backgrounds create a unique environment that will keep you enthralled. Further, the characters you encounter are created using live-action video that has been painted. To interact with the scenery, you use a point-and-click interface, which gives you plenty of time to admire the impressive visuals found throughout the game. If the standard controller does not allow the level of accuracy you desire, there is support for the PlayStation mouse. Much of the game focuses on collecting items and solving puzzles, so put your thinking cap on before you start playing. Will the settlers be able to save their son? Play SILVERLOAD to find out.
title: Silverload

description: Negotiation is for the weak. RETURN FIRE puts you face-to-face with your enemy, locked in life-threatening combat. Using a variety of vehicles helicopters, tanks, humvees, and armored support vehicles it's up to you to break into the opposition's territory, get the flag from the secret bunker, and return to your base safely. Of course, the attack isn't one-sided: your enemy is simultaneously organizing its forces to reach your flag and return with it. As the casualties mount and the destruction spreads, you'll wish this was the "capture the flag" of your childhood. With over 100 intricate, challenging missions and four awesome vehicles to use, the game's replay value is high. The real-time 3D graphics and CD-quality sound will floor you, but the maze-like levels and surprise attacks will really blow you away. The game takes place through nine adrenaline-pumping war zones, each more punishing than the last. Whether you love strategy games, warfare, or just addictive gameplay, you'll find what you're looking for in RETURN FIRE.
title: Return Fire

description: It's pure robot-on-robot ferocity as mechanized warriors duke it out for bragging rights. The sequel to the popular RISE OF ROBOTS, RISE 2 boasts improved graphics, sound that will knock you out of your seat, and an original soundtrack by Queen's Brian May that rivals the music in FLASH GORDON. Choose from an array of 18 sinister hunks of metal as you utilize dozens of brutal combos, gruesome termination moves, and slick 2D fighting techniques. You've seen the 2D setup in the past, but never with this much detail and seamless play. The controls are intuitive and responsive, and the fights are so realistic you'll have to pause the game to breathe. Make no mistake this game is as dark as fighting games come. Each character is a brutal, emotionless automaton determined to end the existence of his on-screen counterpart. Whether you're into robots, fighting games, or neither, there's no room for disappointment here. Boasting several game modes, fully customizable options, and lots of hidden goodies to uncover, this is one sequel that's better than the original.
title: Rise 2: Resurrection

description: Sick of the same old fighting games with warriors, wizards, dinosaurs, and martial arts experts? Good old-fashioned robots are the subjects for this inventive brawl, pitting metal against metal no exceptions. Start with a few pre-designed robots each with simple combat skills and weaponry then earn access to better firepower and parts as your performance improves. As you win or lose you'll gain or lose limbs, making the fighting really exciting. You can even create your own robot, saving your inventions to a Memory Card for use against friends. If you're not feeling terribly inventive, feast your eyes on the menu of over 100 pre-programmed creations that can be unlocked as you advance through the game. The 3D graphics are incredible, sending you to countless locations ranging from icy terrain to grassy fields to a planet being riddled by asteroids. There are lots of objects lying around (depending on your locale) to pick up and throw at the other robots, and you'll find more special weapons the better you fight. Also included is a brutal Head-to-Head mode that lets you take on a friend (or foe). Combining detailed robot building with in-your-face gameplay, ROBO PIT is a fighting game with something for everyone.
title: Robo Pit

description: NBA SHOOTOUT was Sony's first entry in the basketball wars that would soon follow on the PlayStation. The game has many of the standard modes that fans have come to expect from a hoops simulation. The players are high-resolution polygons, and extensive motion capture sessions help create the illusion that you're watching a real NBA game. SHOOTOUT has included lots of simulation options like a Season mode and a full roster of real NBA players who perform closely to their counterpart's abilities. You can also take on a friend in the Multiplayer mode and see who can really sink a 20-footer with a hand in his face.
title: NBA ShootOut

description: While searching for his father, Fynn, a young boy from Canaan Island, notices the uprising of evil all around him. This epic tale of good vs. evil will immerse you in its storyline and leave you playing for hours. The battle scenes are done in full 3D to give the game rich, detailed graphics that accent the engrossing storyline. In BEYOND THE BEYOND you will encounter characters unlike any you've ever seen in a game before, and you will face some of the most terrifying monsters ever created. The innovative top-down isometric view shows off the evolving landscapes you travel through. With each win in battle, your stats increase, making your party more powerful by the minute. Mages, Paladins, thieves, and wise men are all available to help fight in your battle against evil. The emotional soundtrack will truly engross you in this game and send you on a roller coaster of emotions with each plot twist.
title: Beyond The Beyond

description: Dr. Neo Cortex has a plan to take over the world, and he wants to create genetically engineered animals to do his bidding. To create his minions, Cortex kidnaps as many animals as he can; Crash Bandicoot's girlfriend just happens to be one of his victims. Take control of Crash as he runs, jumps, and spins through 30 levels of intense action on three different Australian islands. Luckily, Crash finds some items that help him out along the way: collecting 100 pieces of fruit will earn Crash an extra life, finding the witch doctor's mask will let Crash take extra hits, and finishing levels without losing a life will earn gems. With enough gems, bonus levels open-up. Only you can help Crash save the animals, save his girlfriend, and foil Dr. Cortex's Plot. Are you willing to take on the challenge of CRASH BANIDCOOT?
title: Crash Bandicoot

description: In BUST-A-MOVE 2: Arcade Edition a cute, green dinosaur is under attack from colored bubbles. Armed only with a bubble-shooting machine, the dinosaur must eliminate all of the bubbles before they come crashing down around him. This is fairly simple to do, since any time three bubbles of the same color come into contact with each other they pop; they also destroy any other bubbles they were touching. The major complication is that the bubbles are steadily falling towards our little green friend. Jumping into the game is fairly easy; putting it down is much harder. Will the green dinosaur be able to destroy the bubble menace? Play BUST-A-MOVE 2 and find out.
title: Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition

description: CYBER SPEED is the world television event of the future. Pilot one of eight ships each with different rankings in thrust, speed, mass, and shield strength on a track of pure energy. The trick is that all of the ships are tethered to the track with an energy loop, which supplies the ship with power. If you make a wrong move and strain the loop, your ship loses power and slows down. However, you can regain ground by picking up turbo boosts or using plasma bolts, missiles, and mines to do away with the opposition. Play the Free Race or Time Trial modes to practice driving, and when you get comfortable tackle all 10 tracks in the Tournament mode. Since the tournament is broadcast around the world, feel free to take a break during the commercials between each race. Do you have the skills to become the CYBER SPEED champion?
title: CyberSpeed

description: Her worst fears have come true: Laura receives a phone call, telling her that her father has gone berserk and has embarked on a killing spree in a Los Angeles area hospital. After arriving at the hospital, she finds the police are clueless about what triggered the events inside. Hoping Laura will be able to untangle the mystery, they ask her to go in and find out what happened. Upon entering the building, Laura is sucked into another dimension where the hospital is turned into a mansion. Help Laura navigate through three disks of 3D environments, using guns and swords to dispatch evil. If some of the puzzles get too tough, get clues from the magical compact. Will Laura be able to find out why her father went berserk? Discover the truth in D.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: D

description: In the world of ASSAULT RIGS, physical sports no longer exist. All sports now take place in the virtual world of the Internet. The most popular sport is the mayhem and destruction caused by virtual rigs, or hover tanks. Choose one of three distinctive rigs and pilot it through 40 levels of competition. Your only goal is to win and make your sponsor, ZamCam, Inc., the biggest sponsor of the World Net Championship. Losing is not an option. After dominating the computer-controlled competition, turn your attention to some real world foes with the Two-Player mode. In the world of ASSAULT RIGS, it's all mind over matter.
title: Assault Rigs

description: 1XTREME brings the excitement of extreme sports to the PlayStation. Pick one of four unique apparatuses including inline skates, skateboards, mountain bikes, and street luge and hit one of the five tracks. While out on the track, get past obstacles and pass through gates to collect points and money. If you get through all of the gates on a track, you'll earn a trip to the Money Hall to collect even more cash, which will earn better equipment. If the opponents are getting between you and the cash, you can always punch and kick them out of the way. Take on the computer with the exhibition or season mode, and when the computer-controlled opponents start to fall too easily, challenge a friend with two-player split-screen action. When the need for speed arises, play 1XTREME.
title: ESPN Extreme Games

description: Taking no credit away from its genrepredecessor, Wolfenstein 3-D, DOOM was the breakthrough game of 1993, and the more influential of id's first- person shooters. Its arsenal of powerful guns (namely the shotgun and BFG), intense level of gore and perfect balance of adrenaline-soaked action and exploration kept this gamer riveted for years. The PlayStation version comes packed with more than 50 hellish levels and two-player deathmatch and other competitive modes (via the link cable) running at 30 frames per second. The game supports 24-channel stereo sound effects, all-new secrets, triggers and switches, and more.
platforms: PS SNES N64 PC 32X Amiga Mac GP32 GP32 Jaguar Xbox 360 iPhone Saturn GBA 3DO
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Doom (1993)

description: So, what's your call, coach? You've just been digging through the stats of 300 actual MLB players, putting together an unstoppable team. So, what's first? A quick Exhibition Game against a friend or an AI team, or do you jump right into the Playoffs? If questions like these make you excited and nervous, you might want to keep a bucket of smelling salts handy when you play BOTTOM OF THE 9TH, which lets you customize teams to your liking. There are plenty of preset teams and players to select from, but the real fun lies in creating your own dream team line-up. To keep an eye on your team there are three different camera angles that afford you the luxury to customize your view of the action. Jump from the traditional behind-the-batter POV down to a shot looking over the pitcher's shoulder, or for something a little different pull out to an angled shot just left or right of home plate. The local umpire has a big mouth and he's not afraid to use it, which makes for some fun between the plays. Bring baseball thrills under your control for home run action with BOTTOM OF THE 9th.
title: Bottom of the 9th

description: Soccer comes to the PlayStation with ADIDAS POWER SOCCER. All of the action is created with motion-capture technology, so you can expect some very realistic visuals in the game. Every bicycle kick, every jump kick, and every bit of fancy footwork looks real. All of the realistic animation only adds to the by-the-book Simulation mode. If the refs keep giving you the red card and slowing down the game, play the Arcade mode, where burning kicks light the goalie on fire and jump kicks to the head and shirt pulls are legitimate defensive tactics. With either Simulation or Arcade, you can play a season or a tournament. With all of this soccer action, ADIDAS POWER SOCCER will keep any soccer fan happy.
title: Adidas Power Soccer

description: Strap into the cockpit and take out the terrorists that have threatened the country in AGILE WARRIOR F-111X. The F111x is the most advanced fighter plane in military history, and it's designed to destroy resistance from land, sea, and air. Loaded with stealth technology and enough firepower to wipe out a small country, the F-111x is the ultimate fighter plane. Resistance will be encountered from every angle in every one of the six huge missions. When you get tired of destroying the computer-controlled drones and want the challenge of a real dogfight, blow away your friends with the Two-Player mode. Either way, seeing a bogey go down in a huge flaming ball of death will leave any adrenaline junkie happy for quite some time.
title: Agile Warrior F-111X

description: First-person shooter based on the first three Alien movies. Haunted by memories, you hope there is just some small oversight some simple communications problem, but you know, deep down, in the back of your mind THEY'RE BACK! Face huggers, chest bursters, dog aliens, adult aliens, ruthless corporate shills, and not one, but three Queen aliens. Over 30 acid encrusted levels and an arsenal of lethal weapons await you. All the gut-churning 3D action of the complete Alien Trilogy in one black-death, white-knuckle nightmare. Developed by Probe Entertainment for Acclaim.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Alien Trilogy

description: In ALONE IN THE DARK: One Eyed Jack's Revenge, a little girl has been kidnapped. Who would do such a dastardly thing? The evil pirate captain, One Eyed Jack, that's who. There is only one person who can save that little girl, and that's super sleuth Edward Carnby. Take control of Carnby as he solves complex puzzles, fends off the pirate hoards, and tries to escape the island of Hell's Kitchen in one piece. Never miss a second of the action with camera angles designed to capture everything, including the lush hand-drawn backgrounds. Can Carnby rescue the girl, thwart the plans of One Eyed Jack, and escape Hell's Kitchen? Play ALONE IN THE DARK: One Eyed Jacks Revenge and find out.
title: Alone in the Dark: One Eyed Jack's Revenge

description: Fade to Black is the sequel to Flashback. At the end of the original game, Conrad Hart gained his freedom and escaped the evil Morphs. Unfortunately, he was caught and cryogenically frozen. Fifty years later, Conrad has been sucked onto an alien spacecraft. As luck would have it, the aliens that saved him are the ones he was trying to escape from. After being sent to New Alcatraz, Conrad befriends a human rebel who breaks him out of the prison and gives him a pistol and a communicator. You take control of Conrad as he fights his way through 13 levels in an effort to regain his freedom. Will Conrad be able to get out alive? Play Fade to Black and take control of Conrad's destiny.
title: Fade to Black

description: Get three games for the price of one with DIE HARD TRILOGY, which contains a game based on each of the DIE HARD movies. In DIE HARD, take control of New York police detective John McClane as he explores 15 levels of Nakatomi Plaza, blowing away terrorists and rescuing hostages. But remember, stealth can keep you alive longer than blazing guns. If all that sneaking around drives you insane, plug in a light gun and explore all of the deep recesses of Dulles International Airport while blowing terrorists to bits in DIE HARD 2. When shooting and killing doesn't satisfy your need for action, DIE HARD WITH A VENGENCE has McClane driving through New York City to locate and defuse bombs. DIE HARD TRILOGY lets the fans of the movies recreate some the best action seen in the films.
title: Die Hard Trilogy

description: Terry Pratchett's DISCWORLD is a rather unique place. The entire world is a manhole cover-type disk that covers the back of a giant that is swimming through outer space. DISCWORLD, the game, relates the tale of an apprentice wizard named Rincewind (voiced by Eric Idle of MONTY PYTHON fame). Rincewind has just been chosen by Unseen University's chancellor to take a special mission. Unfortunately, the mission is quite dangerous and requires defeating a dragon. Take control of Rincewind and use a point-and-click interface to solve puzzles and keep the dragon from destroying all of Discworld. You will be amazed by the beautiful hand-drawn animation that illustrates the story. Play DISCWORLD and see if Rincewind will survive to make a sequel.
rating_content: Mature Sexual Themes, Use of Tobacco and Alcohol
title: Discworld

description: BATTLE ARENA TOSHINDEN 2 takes place after Himitsu Kessha founded the first Toshinden, a tournament of brawn that attracted the world's greatest fighters. The evil Gaia Corporation now sponsors the Toshinden and does not want any competition. When they hear of an unsanctioned tournament, they organize another Toshinden to draw out the rebels and kill them. Choose from one of 11 characters, each with unique arenas, and try to survive the Toshinden in the One-Player mode. Or you can take on all of the other competitors in the Full Battle mode. With all of the action in BATTLE ARENA TOSHINDEN 2, watch out for bruises.
title: Battle Arena Toshinden 2

description: All aboard! A-TRAIN for the PlayStation puts you in the engineer's seat as you manage an entire railroad system. You decide where to build, how high to set the fares, how to handle the finances, and where the spending goes. The easy point-and-click interface gets you into the game without any confusion and puts the focus on your budding railroad empire. In true management style, not only what you do corporately affects you, but the entire city as well. The depth of this game is what you make it. Use the land to your advantage as you build tunnels and bridges to expand your rail organization; conduct your business as you see fit, helping or harming the city. Whether you're a generous manager or a ruthless tightwad, it's all up to you! Don't let the A-TRAIN leave the station without you!
platforms: PS Gen NES Amiga PC Mac
title: A-Train

description: Follow the adventures of the friendliest ghost around with CASPER for the PlayStation. Based on the hit 1995 movie, the game follows the plot of the film closely. Casper is on a mission, and he must explore Whipstaff Manor for clues and solve puzzles as he avoids the ghostly trio of Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso who are looking to put a stop to Casper's adventure. The game is played from an isometric perspective, which shows the rooms and hallways of the mansion in high color and detail. You'll have to search the rooms of this huge estate carefully for items such as keys and puzzle pieces that will help you unlock other sections. You can also learn new abilities and gain ghostly powers to further aid you in your adventure.
title: Casper -- A Haunting 3D Challenge

description: Imagine flying through the canyons and passes of a mountain range when suddenly a squadron of Soviet Migs drops out of the sky. It is up to you to save America and destroy the Communist threat as you buzz through the mountains to find the Migs and blow them out of the sky. That is the kind of action found in BOGEY: Dead 6, which brings all of the action and excitement of PC flight simulators to the PlayStation. Take on 12 missions in expansive 3D environments and destroy enemies on land, in the sea, and in the air. After completing a mission, a new plane becomes available, expanding your choices. Planes include the F-14 Tomcat, the F-18 Hornet, the Soviet Mig-29, and others. By being the first game with analog support, the control of each plane is as realistic as possible. With all of the action in BOGEY: Dead 6, you'll swear that you are in a cockpit.
title: Bogey Dead 6

description: Go retro with Namco Museum Vol. 1, a collection of some of the best games from the glory days of the arcade. This volume features Pac-Man, Galaga, Pole Position, Bosconian, Rally-X, New Rally X, and Toy Pop.
title: Namco Museum Vol. 1

description: Race the world's most exciting supercars, each modeled after its real-life counterpart on six challenging, scenic tracks. Pick your race: Time Trials, Head-To-Head, Single Race or Tournament.
title: Road & Track Presents: The Need for Speed

description: It's the era of the Second Han Dynasty, and China is being overrun by powerful warlords. A struggle for power among the court families has spawned a time known as the Three Kingdoms, and it's up to you (as the current ruler) to restore peace to your troubled country. Rebuild the land by creating a strong military or try to outwit your opponents using negotiation. The strategy is completely up to you as there are hundreds of ways you can accomplish your goal. There are plenty of exciting new weapons in this installment of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms saga, such as automatic crossbows, battering rams, and catapults. You can even set enemy ships, towns, and armies ablaze using a variety of fire commands! There are 558 different officers to discuss your strategy with including 108 inspired by your own decisions and preferences. You can choose to play as one of 38 existing rulers, or one of eight user-controlled creations. Full-motion video adds to the excitement in this chapter of the great adventure.
platforms: PS Saturn PC SNES PS3 Wii PSP Wii U
title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV: Wall of Fire

description: PGA TOUR¿96 is an early entry in the long line of PGA Tour titles for the PlayStation. The interface is intuitive and easy to use, and the expansive list of gameplay options results in a fun and gratifying experience. It has two courses (Sawgrass and Spanish Bay), real golfers, various camera angles, and precise play control, resulting in an ultra-realistic golf experience. You can also take on a friend in the Versus mode, which has Best Ball, Skins, and Match Play. PGA TOUR '96 is one of the games that helped set the table for future golf games, and it is worth checking out.
platforms: PS Gen PC SNES Saturn 3DO GB
title: PGA Tour '96

description: Rayman has made its way to the PlayStation. Rayman has a head, torso, hands, and feet, but he is missing a neck, arms, and legs. As you can probably guess, Rayman's world is filled with a healthy amount of humor and insanity; it is also filled with bright colorful graphics. You must guide Rayman through level after level of action. In any given level, Rayman will have to jump from platforms, swing from hooks, or run through mazes. Once you complete a level, you will have to return to it multiple times to collect all of the secrets as Rayman earns new abilities throughout the game. Help Rayman get through all of the levels safely to complete the adventure in Rayman.
platforms: PS PC DSi PSP Wii U Cell Jaguar GBA PS3 Saturn GBC Giz
title: Rayman

description: Get two games for the price of one with RAIDEN PROJECT. You get the original RAIDEN as well as the sequel RAIDEN 2 on one disk. All of the power-ups, enemies, and boss characters that fans of the game loved have been perfectly recreated on the PlayStation. However, a few enhancements have been made. Large ships explode and fall to the ground, possibly taking out other structures and smaller ships explode into hundreds of tiny pieces. There are also several different view formats: Normal format has with black bars on the borders keeping the arcade aspect ratio, Fit-to-Screen removes the bars and fills the television screen, and Vertical ratio with no borders scrolls from left to right (the idea being that you turn your monitor on its side).
title: Raiden Project

description: ANDRETTI RACING brings the excitement of racing to the PlayStation. Unlike most other racing games, ANDRETTI RACING includes both stock car and Formula 1 racing. Take a customized stock car out on one of the 16 real-world tracks like Calder Park Thunderdome, Oceanside International Raceway, or Vallejo Speedway. Should slamming the walls of the track become a regular occurrence, the car will start to show the wear and tear of the race: spoilers will break off, headlights will shatter, or wheels will go flying with really big crashes. To keep that from happening, join the racing school and get video tips from the Andretti family. After learning how to keep your car in mint condition, challenge a friend with the Two-Player mode or compete in the Season mode and claim the championship. Every fan of racing will find something to love in ANDRETTI RACING.
title: Andretti Racing

description: GUNSHIP allows you to sit behind the controls of a combat helicopter. Play a Quick Fire game, and try to blast as many enemies out of the sky as possible. Or, if you've got more long-term aspirations, play the Simulation mode and create a squad of pilots and choose and equip one of the game's eight helicopters, which include the AH-66B Comanche, AH-64A Apache, and UK-60K Blackhawk. Once the chopper is outfitted, choose between missions in Europe and the Persian Gulf. After each mission, you can rank the pilots and give them promotions and honors. Just for the most hardcore flight simulation fans, flight yoke peripherals are supported, giving you the most realistic helicopter simulation you're likely to see. With all of the options, modes, and missions, GUNSHIP has plenty to keep aspiring combat aces busy well into the future.
platforms: PS PC CD32 PSP PS3 Vita
title: Gunship

description: OLYMPIC SUMMER GAMES brings the rules and spirit of the Olympics home to the PlayStation. The wide spectrum of Olympic competition is covered in the game's 15 events. It's all there, from running and jumping, to swimming, shooting, and weight lifting. All of the events look realistic, thanks to motion-captured animation--you will see how athletes really jump over a seven-foot tall bar. And clearing that seven-foot hurdle will help you destroy the computer-controlled competition. However, it would be much more fun to smoke seven of your friends and rub their faces in your superiority as a virtual athlete. Most people will never be able to compete in the Olympics, but with OLYMPIC SUMMER GAMES for the PlayStation, you can come awfully close.
title: Olympic Summer Games: Atlanta '96

description: Talk about evil  some lady named Helga has captured all of the citizens between the ages of 13 and 30 and made them part of her New Order. She's brainwashed them all into enforcing her rules: no music, no dancing, no playing games no freedom at all! As the last surviving youth of free society, you'll have to make your way through the rigors of downtown Los Angeles to reach Club X, where Aerosmith is scheduled to play a show this very evening. Of course, the New Order will do everything in its power to stop you, so you'll have to move quickly and stealthily. One thing that might come in handy is your gun. Not only does it should regular bullets, but it can be used to shoot compact discs as well which is sure to rile those New Order drones. Based on a popular arcade game of the same name, REVOLUTION X is one of the best-selling games of all time on the PlayStation. Top-notch voice acting and cool graphics abound in this one-of-a-kind.
platforms: PS Arcade Saturn PC Gen SNES
title: Revolution X

description: Aliens attack and nearly destroy Earth. Now, a handful of fighter pilots must battle the aliens in 15 missions of intense combat in order to save the planet from annihilation. To survive, the pilots will have to navigate 3D terrain including jungles, deserts, and cities. Once the Earth is free of the alien menace, you must enter space and put a permanent end to the threat by blasting the aliens light years away. Only you can save the planet from destruction in SHOCKWAVE ASSAULT.
title: Shockwave Assault

description: The popular PC baseball series HARDBALL comes to the PlayStation with HARDBALL 5. You can practice use the batting and pitching controls with the batting and pitching Practice modes. Once you understand how the controls work, play a quick exhibition game with a friend or try to hit the most long-balls in the Home Run Derby. Those looking for a challenge should take on a shortened or full 162-game season, where you are the manager and will have to decide starting line-ups, when to send a runner home, and make substitutions. No matter how you play, an MLBPA license guarantees that you favorite players will be in the game. Play by play commentary from Al Michaels will make the game seem more realistic. HARDBALL 5 will make you think the boys of summer have invaded your living room.
title: HardBall 5

description: Blaze into vehicular combat mayhem with TWISTED METAL from Sony. It is the year 2010; desecration and madness have spread across the cities like a plague. You are the fastest and toughest car commando alive, and your task is to choose from more than a dozen hi-tech, battle-hardened street machines like taxi cabs, police cars, motorcycles, and ice cream trucks and compete in contests of brute force and MAD MAX-style survival. Try to find the time to enjoy the stunning, fully interactive 3D scenery as you careen from building to building and street to street in an attempt to evade your evil pursuers and emerge victorious. In Single-Player mode or Head-to-Head PlayStation-networked battle, you'll race through five different worlds, shooting and maneuvering against devilish foes and bizarre criminals. Wage deadly war with awesome weapons like machine guns, flamethrowers, and missile launchers, and switch between four camera views including dashboard POV and third-person perspective. In the psychotic, hard-driving insanity of TWISTED METAL, you'll need nerves of steel to survive the sick but fun demolition derby from Hell.
title: Twisted Metal [1996]

description: WIPEOUT XL marks the return of the popular futuristic racer to the PlayStation. Just as in the original game, players must race across crazy tracks while driving hovercraft from the future. On top of the racing action, players need to collect weapons in order to take down their closet competitors. This game introduces the Pit, where any player can stop to regain valuable shield energy. There is also a Two-Player mode, enabling two people to take to the course at the same time and determine who is the superior racer. The music from the first game is gone, but this time around there is licensed music from popular bands like as Prodigy and The Chemical Brothers. Everything in WIPEOUT XL has been updated, with weapons that are even more destructive, music that provides even more of an adrenaline rush, and courses that keep players busy for a long time.
platforms: PS PSP PS3 PC Saturn Mac
title: WipEout XL

description: Get ready for a racing adventure like no other with Wipeout for the PlayStation. The game is unique from most other titles, in that it allows the player to fly hovering craft above the surface of the track, traveling at incredible speeds that will leave any gamer breathless. Each race occurs with several other vehicles on the track, though the gameplay does not rest with simply beating the opponent. Each course is littered with numerous weapons and power-ups that can be used to help destroy, or otherwise delay, the enemy. In addition to the races against the CPU, there is the option for two-player races, which adds a bigger challenge and more replay value to the title. The included techno soundtrack is fast-paced and invigorating, helping pull the player right into the game.
platforms: PS PSP PC Saturn Android PS3
title: WipEout

description: Fighting game with a unique quest mode, from Square.  The publisher enlisted the help of Seiichi Ishii, who had previously worked on both Tekken and Virtua Fighter. On these strengths, Square helped Ishii start his own development company, Dream Factory, and Tobal No.1 is the first game from the developer. The game offers some 3D movement for more behind-the-back attacks that fighting games released around the same time. Tobal also introduced an interesting grapple move, which allows you to grab your opponent and, depending on your button execution, throw them in a myriad of ways. The game features Gouraud-shaded players displayed in hi-res mode (640x480) and shipped with an included Final Fantasy VII demo.
title: Tobal No. 1

description: After it was discovered that he was experimenting on humans, Dr. Edward Bilstein was exiled from Earth. Now he seeks to return to his former home to exact his revenge. You play as one of the 10 people that Bilstein used as subjects in his twisted experiments as you fight to see which one of you gets the opportunity to challenge the evil doctor in a fight to the death. Each character is armed with unique weapons, ranging from yo-yos to swords, so your fighting style will be determined by which fighter you choose. After selecting your character, use the Practice mode to learn all of the moves, including the ultra-powerful Plasma moves. If your friends want to challenge you to a fight, play the Two-Player mode and see who is the better warrior. Now's your chance to get revenge on Bilstein in STAR GLADIATOR.
title: Star Gladiator Episode 1: Final Crusade

description: Get behind the controls of the world's most advanced aircraft in STAR FIGHTER and battle through 45 missions. The early levels are designed to let you get you accustomed to the game controls and the basics of taking off and landing. While playing a mission, you will fly through 3D environments filled with hills, mountains, houses, and buildings as you hunt your foes. After all of the enemies have been eliminated on the surface of a planet, hit the high altitudes of outer space, where you'll find even more baddies. Barrel roll, dive, bank, and loop your way past the enemies and on to victory in STAR FIGHTER.
title: Starfighter

description: BATTLE ARENA TOSHINDEN features eight different fighters of different nationalities and fighting styles. The characters are very detailed as to properly represent their respective cultures. Each character's fighting style is also very different, offering lots of variety. To make your life easier, TONSHINDEN offers the chance to assign the shoulder buttons to special moves making them easier to complete. To make the combat more realistic, you're able to side step attacks and circle around your opponents. When you're getting low on health, you can give it your all with one of the various death moves that inflict massive damage to your enemy. Instead of your typical side view in fighting games, TOSHINDEN uses a camera that zooms in on the battlefield, catching all the action. The fighting arenas available in TOSHINDEN are huge and are very interactive. Enter at your own risk.
title: Battle Arena Toshinden

description: Can you handle all of the action in Destruction Derby? Jump into your car and take on one of four single-player modes: Wreckin' Racing has the player go through five divisions trying to score points by finishing with the leaders and causing major wrecks; Stock Car racing places more emphasis on finishing first, but slamming an opponent into the wall still makes for a great winning tactic; in the Destruction Derby, your only goal is to be the last car running. For those who don't like scratching up their fenders, try to set a lap record in the Time Trial mode. And if playing solo has you going loco, then hook up the link cable with another PlayStation and enjoy some two-player action. Take on challenges like seek and destroy, duel, team pairs, and tag. DESTRUCTION DERBY will test your driving skill as well as your survival instincts.
platforms: PS PC PS3 N64 PSP Saturn Android
title: Destruction Derby

description: In AQUANAUGHTS HOLIDAY, you take the role of a world-famous oceanographer. Unfortunately, the press, the government, and environmentalists are constantly bombarding you. Seeing the stress that you are under, your boss sends you on a long-term assignment to get away and recharge your batteries. Go to the last unexplored part of the ocean, map it, talk to the wildlife, and create a coral reef refuge. The best part about the whole assignment is that there is no time limit, no monsters to destroy, and no evil plots to thwart. Just kick back, relax, and do everything at your own pace. What you want to accomplish is AQUANAUGHTS HOLIDAY is up to you. Just don't relax so much that you drown.
title: Aquanaut's Holiday

description: In CREATURE SHOCK, monsters are intent on destroying the planet. You must stop them by blasting the creatures out of the sky using your spaceship. When a more personal touch is required, exit the ship and blast the enemies from a first-person perspective. Either way, the full screen 3D graphics and ray-traced animation establish a sinister mood that is enhanced by the music and the sound effects. In addition to the brilliant gameplay graphics, there are a number of full motion video clips that also advance the story. Save the Earth from alien monsters in CREATURE SHOCK.
title: Creature Shock

description: Lock on and unleash the most devastating firepower in the skies. You are the team leader of an elite corps of mercenaries -- fighter pilots hired to strike where NATO air forces have failed. Your mission? Take out a ruthless sect of terrorists that has invaded and entrenched themselves within the confines of several global hot spots. Your hardware? Everything from F-15's to Radar-invisible F-22 stealth fighters. The briefing is over, gentlemen. Win one for the free world. Good hunting.
title: Air Combat

description: Aliens have invaded the Lunar 1 mining colony and are holding the workers hostage. The aliens want to use the moon as a base, and you are the only person who can save the workers and prevent the aliens from taking over. Luckily, you are in a vehicle specially designed to navigate the tight corridors of the mineshafts. Your vehicle is also equipped with guns, missiles, and other weapons you can use to destroy the alien threat. Don't miss a single detail of the 27 levels thanks to the fully 3D environments and full 360-degree movement. If you need some help or just want to destroy a human opponent, connect two PlayStations with a link cable and let the good times roll. Do you have the skills and balance to save the mineworkers? Play DESCENT and find out.
title: Descent

description: The year is 2067. Prosperity has spread throughout the world. However, decadence has started society's decay. Similar to the decline of the ancient Romans, the only spectator sports left are blood sports. Duels between huge tanks, known as cyber sleds, are the most popular. You are one of these future gladiators, a sled jockey. Jump into one of six tanks, each varying in speed, shield strength, weapon power, and maneuverability and enter an arena. As an added bonus, choose between the original arcade arenas or new PlayStation arenas. Avoid obstacles and try to blast your opponent into small unrecognizable pieces with machine guns, heat seeking missiles, and other weapons. If your friends question your skills, challenge them to a match in the Two Player mode. Test your mettle and try to survive to see another day in CYBER SLED.
platforms: PS Arcade Wii PSP PS3 Saturn
title: Cyber Sled

description: You are an engineer and generally, you work at night when the world is quiet. Tonight, you are working to get space colony MRP-6F up and running. Suddenly, the space station comes under attack from aliens. What are you going to do? Getting the perimeter defenses up and running seems like a good idea. Blast your way through alien drones as you travel from terminal to terminal, activating switches and tweaking the software that is needed to defend the colony. Thanks to advanced AI the alien drones never do the same thing twice, so prepare to adjust to new circumstances. If the going gets tough, trap the aliens behind doors. Follow the story as it unfolds in stunning full-motion video sequences. Can you survive long enough to save the station and yourself? Play DEFCON 5 and find out.
title: DEFCON 5

description: The arcade hit KING OF FIGHTERS '95 has come to the PlayStation. Choose from 26 different characters and let the brawling begin. Play the Normal mode and face a series of one-on-one fights. After beating all of the competition, you will learn of each character's unique motivation for entering the King of Fighters tournament. In addition to the Normal mode, a Team Battle option has been included, where two teams of three of fighters compete against each other. You can choose from eight different teams or create your own with the team edit feature. No matter what mode you play, you must be aware of the last resort moves whenever a character is about to be defeated, he or she has access to huge fireball or massive hit combinations that can level the playing field in an instant. Do you have the skills to beat KING OF FIGHTERS '95?
platforms: PS NGCD Arcade Wii Saturn Saturn Xbox One PS4 NG GB PSP PS3
title: The King of Fighters '95

description: The evil Kaptain Kabuki wants to bottle the planet and add it to his collection. Baron Aloha gets wind of this and makes a call to his nemesis Robbit, the mechanical rabbit. Now it is up to Robbit to travel through 12 all-new levels in search of missing MuuMuus. The robotic rabbit is going to encounter a wide range of enemies, but Robbit can pick up a large number of weapons along the way including homing rockets, cherry bombs, Roman candles, fireworks, and power orbs. In addition to the main game, there is a Time Attack mode: when players complete a level within a certain amount of time, new extras are unlocked. Can Robbit trust the Baron or is he being led into a trap? Find out by playing JUMPING FLASH! 2.
title: Jumping Flash! 2

description: EPIDEMIC is the unofficial sequel to KILEAK: The DNA Imperative. The year is 2065, and the human race faces extinction from a deadly virus. Those lucky enough to be alive live under the Byflos, and they view Byflos as a savior. After the virus infects your girlfriend, you begin to think that Byflos may be responsible for the outbreak in the first place. Strap in behind the controls of a giant mechanized robot and blast over 40 different types of enemies, and never miss a bad guy with a new target-locking system. Collect items and then use them to solve the multitude of puzzles, and never lose track of where you are and where you been with the auto-mapping function. The story comes to life with full-motion video clips. Is Byflos responsible for the plague ravaging the world? Find the truth in EPIDEMIC.
title: Epidemic

description: If you're the type who likes to blow stuff up then you are in luck, because PHILOSOMA has taken the best elements of past shooters and put them together into one game. Virtually every conceivable camera angle is used, from the typical side-scrolling perspective to an in-front-of-your-craft angle to shooting backwards. Your co-pilot will provide you with useful information, as you'll usually be concentrating on your enemies in this fast-paced game. There is plenty of stuff to destroy, and numerous power-ups and weapons to choose from. PHILOSOMA requires lightning-quick reactions and a fast trigger finger, so if you think you're ready, then give it a try.
title: Philosoma

description: Basketball fans know authenticity when they see it, and NBA: In the Zone is definitely the real deal. The first game in a long series of In the Zone titles, the original is packed with NBA-style excitement from the tip-off to the final buzzer. All 29 teams (circa 1996, mind you) are available for competition, and it's a trip just to see which teams all of the players were on back in the mid-'90s. As soon as you pop the game in, you'll notice that the graphics were truly ahead of their time with 3D texture-mapped polygons for fluid gameplay. There are tons of offensive and defensive maneuvers to test out, including behind-the-back passes, skyhooks, alley-oops, fade-away jumpers, and huge dunks. Boasting AI that is much better than anything else that came out for a few years after its release, the original In the Zone is the perfect game for classic gaming aficionados or big-time hoops junkies.
title: NBA In the Zone

description: Hop on your Magic Carpet and battle through sorcerers and demons as you attempt to possess the coveted mana. You're responsible for restoring equilibrium to the shattered world in this one-player game. Return to your castle with as much mana as you're able to gather in your hot air balloon. New spells you learn along the way will help you with the forces of evil. Keep your eyes peeled and rid the world of these unspeakable horrors!
platforms: PS PC PSP Saturn PC C64 2600 PS3
title: Magic Carpet

description: Forget the real pros. All-new players, all-new stadiums, and ultra-exciting tennis take center court in this mixture of arcade style and tennis physics. If you've ever fantasized about being one of the world's top-ranked players, this is your chance. With fictional players like Julia Cappuccino and Bart Sunrise putting strings to ball, anything is likely to happen out there. You choose whether you want to play a one-, three-, or five-set match on the smooth surface of a hard court, the unpredictability of clay, or the prestige of grass. Prefer your tennis TV style? Choose any view you'd like, and even take a 360-degree sweep around your player. With fully rendered 3D graphics, you're delivered right to the stadium atmosphere, and you take your pick of five different music styles to serve as your soundtrack. If you just don't like music, you can even turn it off. Play Singles, Doubles, or Mixed Doubles and create dream pairings like Cappuccino and Sunrise. Whether you like tennis, videogames, or both, you'll find that POWER SERVE TENNIS is a hard hitter.
title: Power Serve 3D Tennis

description: The sign of a great videogame is that it's as much fun to watch someone else play it as it is to play yourself. With its excellent graphics and heart-stopping action, this can certainly be said of RESIDENT EVIL a graphic adventure game that is as engaging as a Hollywood horror movie. In the game, you and your partner are given a set number of tasks to accomplish and puzzles to solve, and when you're not busy doing that you're blasting away at undead zombies and packs of demonic dogs. The weapons at your disposal range from a relatively ineffective pistol to a grotesquely effective rocket launcher. In the years since this game first came out there have been dozens of games attempting to snatch the RESIDENT EVIL crown, but so far none have come close in delivering engaging game play and cinematics that cause event the most hardened gamer to jump out of their skin.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: Resident Evil [1996]

description: NCAA GAMEBREAKER is based on the NFL GAMEDAY engine, so you can expect the same high detail and graphical quality. This game also has the options and nuances that will bring out your school spirit And you can expect a huge stable of teams to choose from, and excellent motion-captured animations that really help put you right in the middle of the action. You'll also get stellar music from the marching bands of each school, as well as top-notch play-by-play commentary. Remember to vary your play calling, though, because your play pattern is stored on the system's memory. As you play subsequent games, the computer remembers your strategy and adjusts accordingly, making the game more challenging as you march towards the National Championship. You can also take on a friend in the Versus mode and find out who has the best college football mind.
title: NCAA GameBreaker

description: A light-gun shooter that is set in the make-believe metropolis known as Metro City. Under attack by a corrupt dictator's robots, your team of cyborg mechanized troops is the town's only line of defense. Characters designed by Masamune Shirow.
title: Project: Horned Owl

platforms: PC Saturn Gen GB SNES PS
title: Frank Thomas: Big Hurt Baseball

description: Imagine running down the left wing with the ball as you sprint past the defense. A teammate lines up in the box, and you place a perfect crossing pass to your teammate who heads it in for a goal! GOAL STORM brings this kind of soccer excitement to the PlayStation. Choose your country and team, and then hit the field in the Exhibition or Tournament modes. No matter what mode you play, all of the rules of soccer apply: throw-ins, offsides, and penalties. If you do get caught breaking the rules, the dreaded red card will be issued and you will have to play a man down. For those who like to control every aspect of play, choose team strategies and line formations. You can also challenge friends to a game to see who is the master of the soccer pitch. GOAL STORM provides all of the action and options that soccer fans demand.
title: Goal Storm

description: The Dark Anarchy Society is destroying all of the Earth's major cities. As a submarine captain, your job is to find the Society's secret underwater base and destroy it. Take control of the sub, and use lasers and torpedoes to eliminate the opposition. Fortunately, there are weapon upgrades that will allow you to dispose of the bad guys more efficiently. Don't forget to keep an eye on the surface, since helicopters, ships, and other submarines will assault you from all sides. Play through seven levels including "The South Pole," "The Channel," "Seabed Ruins," "Sunken Town," "Deep Dark Sea," and the "Enemy Base." If you need some help, call a friend over and play the two-player Cooperative mode. Will you be able to save the world from the Dark Anarchy Society? Play IN THE HUNT and find out.
title: In the Hunt

description: Try to become the world's greatest athlete in INTERNATIONAL TRACK & FIELD. You can compete in 11 events: the 100-meter dash, 110-meter hurdles, long jump, triple jump, high jump, pole vault, hammer throw, javelin, discus, shot put, and 100-meter freestyle swimming. If you are having problems qualifying in a certain event, use the Practice mode to improve your skills. No matter how you play, all of the competitors are rendered in 3D, and all of the events take place in highly detailed venues. An in-game announcer will make you think that you have stumbled upon a live broadcast of the World Championships. With a multi-tap and some friends, up to four players can compete at one time. Even if you can't run very fast in real life, you can become a track star with INTERNATIONAL TRACK & FIELD.
title: International Track & Field

description: NOVASTORM is part racing and part combat, with everything taking place on a track. It's from the same developers responsible for the WIPEPOUT series, so you can expect the same high-speed action. The goal of the game is to save the human race from renegade computers that have threatened humankind's existence. You fly the Scavenger 7 spacecraft through trenches and over mountains, shooting at oncoming targets. The terrain interacts with you, which offers some cool effects, but it can also destroy you. In other words, don't get caught up in all the visual glory of the game, or you'll pay the ultimate price. You can also find power-ups, battle huge bosses, and generally blast anything on the screen.
title: Novastorm

description: In PO'ED you're a chef aboard a ship that has been invaded by aliens. Your only hope for survival (and escape) is your superior intellect and your fast reflexes. This game is a first-person shooter that reminds many gamers of classics like DOOM and QUAKE. On the menu, you'll find weapons, battle bosses, and run and strafe your way through a seemingly endless army of malevolent aliens. This game was originally on the all-but-forgotten 3DO. Control is much improved over the original, with the PlayStation controller's extra buttons making things a little easier. The number of moves your chef character can pull off is impressive, considering the basic gameplay of run-and-strafe found in most first-person shooters. Not only can you run and shoot, but you can also jump, fly, and even do backflips.
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence
title: PO'ed

description: Whether you like high-flying two-on-two action or a five-on-five sim, you've come to the right game: NBA JAM TOURNAMENT EDITION. While the gameplay may look frantically unorganized, the players actually play like their real-life counterparts, and will even run plays from their NBA playbooks. You'll also get in-depth scouting reports that give you the skinny on your opponents. The motion capture was done by former NBA star Xavier McDaniel, so expect silky-smooth player animations. Bonus modes include a 3-Point Contest, Free Throw Shooting, and Practice. There are also bonus courts, which include Venice Beach and the Schoolyard. TNT's Kevin Harlan handles the play-by-play, while Marv Albert offers his analysis from the studio.
platforms: PS Gen GG Saturn 32X GB Jaguar PC Mac SNES Arcade
title: NBA Jam: Tournament Edition

description: Step into the ring with eight of the biggest stars in the WWF including Brett The Hitman Hart and the Undertaker. Wear down the opposition with standard wrestling moves, and then climb the ropes for some high-flying action. If you are taking a beating, you can quickly turn things around by using one of the character-specific special moves. Try to stake your claim on the championship belt in WWF WRESTLEMANIA: The Arcade Game.
platforms: PS PC Arcade 32X Saturn Gen SNES
title: WWF Wrestlemania: The Arcade Game

description: Go back in time to a place where banana boards and new wave music ruled a generation, and videogames were the fresh new thing. Six original games grace the grooves of this disc: JOUST, the prehistoric floating battle for the ages; ROBOTRON 2084, a classic challenge that has you blowing away everything in sight as you pass from screen to screen; SINISTAR, a game in which you float through space, trying to destroy a talking meteor; DEFENDER, the original outer-space shooting adventure; DEFENDER II, which was originally known as STARGATE; and BUBBLES, a strategy game that casts you as a well-meaning bubble in a sink. A true collector's edition, the title includes lots of historical information about the creation of each included classic, and there are even advertisements and video footage of interviews with the games' creators. Whether you're looking for a trip down memory lane, an intense history lesson, or six games for the price of one, you can't go wrong here.
title: Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits

description: The classic Russian puzzle game comes to the PlayStation with TETRUS PLUS. You must arrange oddly shaped pieces composed of four blocks into complete horizontal lines. When you complete a line, it disappears and the remaining blocks settle into the bottom of the bin. The game gets faster and more difficult as you complete lines, with the game ending when the pile of pieces reaches the top of the screen. This classic gameplay is available along with a few other modes that help to inject new life into the TETRIS name. A new split-screen option allows players to play at the same time while not competing with each other. Of course, if you are feeling competitive, you can challenge a friend in the classic Versus mode. There's also a new Puzzle mode, in which you're trying to help a professor study some ancient ruins. This mode places the curious professor at the bottom of the bin along with some pre-arranged pieces, and you've got to clear the pieces for the professor to escape to the next level. All of the action of classic TETRIS, along with a few new twists, can be your with TETRIS PLUS.
title: Tetris Plus

description: Slam 'n Jam '96: Featuring Magic and Kareem is another title in the PlayStation's extensive list of basketball games. Choose a team and use the Exhibition mode to get in a quick game of hoops. If you are looking for extended competition, play a 14-, 28-, 56-, or 82-game season. When the hassles of a season become too much, you can skip right to the Playoffs. In addition to your duties as a player, you must also be your team's General Manager. Decide who starts and who sits, trade players, sign free agents, and work on team strategy. While playing a season, several statistical categories are tracked including points per game, rebounds, and assists. With a multi-tap, up to four players can play at once against each other or on the same team. Experience basketball like never before with Slam 'n Jam '96: Featuring Magic and Kareem.
title: Slam 'n Jam '96: Featuring Magic and Kareem

description: Grab your racket and take to the court with V-TENNIS for the PlayStation. Ever dream of going up against the big boys and girls of tennis? Well, now you can. While the players names have been altered slightly, the intended representations are obvious. Choose from 16 pros, each rated in serve, footwork, speed, forehand, and backhand. Or you can even create your own athlete and save him or her to the memory card. Compete in Singles, Doubles, or Versus modes on grass, clay, carpet, and hard courts. Play in numerous locales like New York, Japan, or exotic Fiji. You get to choose the length of the game, and matches can last one, three, or five sets. A variety of different viewing perspectives can be selected as well, so you're likely to find one that suits your taste. So go ahead and smash a kicking slicer to the baseline V-TENNIS is ready to return your serve.
title: V-Tennis

description: Get ready to race across painstakingly recreated Tokyo cities and streets in TOKYO HIGHWAY BATTLE. Hop in one of over 72 different sportscars in your speed-quest to become the absolute best. Racing champion Keiichi Tsuchiya and automotive specialist Masaaki Bando were brought in to help assure accuracy in car physics and handling. You'll need to master the "Drift" button to help you grip the road as you blast around hairpin corners. Earn valuable points as you race, and use those points to upgrade vehicle parts in the Speed Shop. You can compete against three AI drivers at once, go one-on-one with the computer, or improve your lap times and learn the courses in Practice mode. As you race you'll listen to the pumping strains of techno music and enjoy the authentic sound of high-pitch gear shifting, wheels screeching on asphalt, and the hum of finely-tuned engines in sleek racing machines.
title: Tokyo Highway Battle

description: The PlayStation is host to many different 3D fighting games, but ZERO DIVIDE contains many quirks that separate it from the rest. The first thing that you'll notice is that each character is actually a robot. Each robot has different moves that can be performed using button combinations, while others feature weapons that can be used during battle. Each fight is quick and merciless, with quick strikes being the most effective strategy. There is a Two-Player mode included for friends who wish to duke it out, making the replay value of the title much stronger. Each location is a 3D arena that keeps the robots in close proximity to each other, meaning hand-to-hand combat is the name of the game. ZERO DIVIDE features fresh gameplay and exciting combat in a completely original package.
title: Zero Divide

description: X-COM: UFO Defense takes the normal PC-style approach to strategy games and converts it to the PlayStation. The story begins with aliens invading Earth. You must find a way to fight back through outright assault, as well as through the use of some subterfuge. First you must make sure to gather enough money and budget it wisely, since you will need it to purchase new buildings and equipment. Each upgrade increases your chances of destroying the enemy and getting on to the next mission. To keep the gameplay fresh and interesting, every level follows a different structure and planning your attack is essential. You also have the ability to research confiscated alien artifacts and use them to your advantage later. The fate of the world is in your hands, as you are the only one with the intelligence, resourcefulness, and courage to save humanity.
title: X-COM: UFO Defense

description: Can a vampire beat up a werewolf? Can a mummy cream a zombie? Could a Bigfoot smack around an alien? If these are the kind of questions that keep you up at night, rejoice. The arcade hit DARK STALKERS: The Night Warriors comes to the PlayStation, and it can answer all of your questions. Choose from 10 horror-themed characters, including a Bigfoot, a vampire, and a werewolf. Every character has unique combinations and super moves, but be warned, as the arenas can have positive and negative effects on the fighters. Over 15,000 frames of gorgeous, hand-drawn animation bring the action to life. After beating the computer-controlled contenders, challenge your friends in the Versus mode. If they fear your superior skills, feel free to handicap the match. DARK STALKERS: The Night Warriors will challenge your skills as you fight to become the ruler of the night.
title: Darkstalkers: The Night Warriors

description: Electronic Arts brings international soccer to the PlayStation with FIFA SOCCER '96. All of the major soccer-playing countries are represented. Dribble down the field and pass it into the box where a teammate is waiting to head it in; all of these actions can be performed with ease. For those who tend to have a defensive mindset, blocking and tackling are just as easy to pull off as well. No matter your soccer philosophy, your tactics can be recreated.
